mainText:
First of all my best thoughts go to Steve's family. Steve was to my eyes one
of the greatest man of this planet. His way of thinking, his vision, his
products literally changed my life. He inspired me and make me realize how
PASSION is the most important thing in life.

Thank you for everything you've done Steve. Be sure that your memory will
stay forever in our hearts. Rest in peace Steve.
author: Fabrice
